lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, the grass is really cold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, you can have these old boots of mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. Ice cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I admire how you're really sticking to that. I'm in awe. I'm impressed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we knew this about me already.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are better. They're Velcro.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should call out to the werewolves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You think we should call out to the werewolves for what purpose?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need diamonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't need diamonds anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All last night, "we need diamonds." Huge discussion. Took forever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't need them anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then you suggested we sleep, and suddenly we don't need diamonds anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did we need diamonds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were going to buy your soul back for a lot of diamonds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That makes no sense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a high-cost spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Attempt to resurrect you. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good to know in the future, though. I'm going to save every diamond we find.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably-- I get the distinct impression this is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should still call the werewolves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just because?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How often are you in the Feywild? It's like going to Philadelphia and not eating a cheesesteak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But since we are here... I'm not going to pretend I have a plan. I don't know what we're going to do. We are frighteningly outmatched.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've already slept here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go back, where are we going? Where were we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the places that are winter?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vasselheim?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't do this alone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Artagan? That's his name, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a start.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Artagan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The guy who messed with us for three days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but he was really powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. He was. I bet if we call the werewolves, he will show up, as well. I'll just howl for them real quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like we can stop you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True. (howls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it! 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't much space for it to really echo, as the trees absorb a lot of the sound, but you howl. It's cathartic. You wait. You don't hear any response.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love Teen Wolf. I know every line in that fucking movie. Michael J. Fox.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Artagan is a good start. We need...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The help of the gods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Higher powers here, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sarenrae.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a start.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can ask. That doesn't mean we're going to get it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pickle, I actually mean a little more than that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are not enough, in this instance. We need to fucking go and talk to Sarenrae.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we go and talk to Sarenrae? Vasselheim?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it possible?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where is Sarenrae?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have a very different connection with your god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can take us anywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, a plane? A heaven plane? A god plane?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That doesn't exist, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gods? You don't think the gods exist, after all you've seen, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a very long discussion, but I meant actual location for them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought gods were supposed to be all omnipresent and whatnot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know that Sarenrae exists on a plane like this, and she's not the only god that exists on this one particular plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So how do we go there? Would they kill us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knock, knock, hello? I bamfed into your universe. I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We wouldn't come by if it weren't an emergency.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What else have we been doing for the last year and a half but knocking on different dimensional doors?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do like New Vax's tenacity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would we be accepted there? I've done some things in my life that are less than heavenly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where could you not talk your way into, Scanlan Shorthalt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does immediately become the concern that I can't get us anywhere unless I have some sort of item, generally a tuning fork or some sort of attuned item to that plane to get us there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We start in Vasselheim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe she can help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Pike have anything attuned to Sarenrae, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, to Sarenrae? I don't think they're in the same place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, were you about to ask a question?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit, what was I going to say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is her symbol attuned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Being attuned to a deity isn't being attuned to a plane of existence, and those things can be-- the attunement process. You don't know much about what that would entail, but you imagine that would have something to do with a place of very strong holy worship of that particular deity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to assume that sometime in the last year and a half, these two have told you that I dipped into a bathtub full of blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you weren't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The temples in Vasselheim are old. The oldest, including the temple that you helped pull out of the dirt. If anywhere is attuned to the gods, it is Vasselheim.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh! What about Kord? I'm wearing his oven mitts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that mean I should go talk to Melora?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we straight-up god recruiting? Is that what you mean? Do gods talk to each other?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the Raven Queen and Sarenrae are best buds, aren't they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like when you're in the same clique, when you're on the same level, everyone talks, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a small group of people. They have to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think what Vax is trying to say is we need patrons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Patrons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need patronage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not enough. We are not enough for this. We are going to all die horribly if we try anything like that again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need them with us, or they're going to imbue us--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pelor lives here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lives here in the Feywild?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pelor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of us, your family.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to deal with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have a short list, is what we're saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to get a slightly longer list, and we have to start begging. We are going to owe favors. We are going to owe our lives. We are going to lose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we really going to pledge allegiance to a bunch of different gods? That's what we're going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That could be cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we each get different suits, matching suits, but in different colors? God powers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want some ale?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like Captain Planet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's your god going to be? Is there a god of mischief or song or cubes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A religion check? 14. Do I add my jack-of-all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. There is the Moon Weaver.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Moon Weaver?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Oh, moon weaver!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is the god of moonlight and the autumn season, as well as the patron of illusions and misdirection.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Moon Weaver. A god that I've heard of once, and therefore will pledge my eternal allegiance to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're god-spitballing here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Moon Weaver? They have a temple to her in Syngorn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have an Ioun Stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ioun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ioun is the goddess of knowledge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Put her on our to-call list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I've been praying to Sarenrae lately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if I were to channel divinity and try to make a prayer and be like, hey, can we come up there right quick?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it better to do that here or on the Prime Material Plane? Or does it really matter?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't care, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go back to your temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also probably want to alert the mortal coil that everything has gone to shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, the longer we're here, potentially, the more time gets wonky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're on a ticking clock, here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to Vasselheim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like this idea. It's a little crazy, but I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should start with one god and see how it goes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Start with one that really likes you. So Sarenrae's a good call there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll work our way through in a montage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worked for me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A god-tage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we hold hands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we all get tattoos? (singing) We need a god-tage!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're just going to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, we didn't talk to Artagan. Artagan, are you here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that how it works?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you hear us? Do you want to help us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe if we do something even stupider than holding hands in a circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did any werewolves show up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (howling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with a singular howl, you all shift out of the Feywild and then rapidly appear right on the outskirts of the outer wall of Vasselheim. You see the large, almost Sumerian-looking structures and walls that surround the outside. The ancient architecture of the place definitely has the oldest look, and you remember seeing it from the top when you flew in through your first skyship arrival into Vasselheim. The snow-covered ground and snow-covered trees as part of the Vesper Timberland.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately look around in a 360, very quickly. Does there look like any big cities that should not be here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a city on top of the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you arrive, there's a weird fuzziness in your mind in regards to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Oh god, what if it's been years?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would like all of you guys to make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could lose our memories!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wisdom saving throws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're immune to that, right? People with fey ancestry?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's charm or sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Creatures who have fey ancestry are immune to it, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Damn it! I used luck and I rolled the same thing on both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're immune.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For charm and sleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have the fey ancestry trait, you're immune.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had to burn a resolve.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you have it, too. You're a half-elf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throw, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have advantage because of gnome cunning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a spell or magical effect. It's a planar effect, so I'd say no. What did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. No, can you do it on a saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. It's ability checks, only.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think it's just ability checks. Let me check, just to be safe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I burned a resolve. I've got to make sure that I can use the resolve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, ability checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use resolve on this? Okay, in that case, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, Scanlan: Vax is there alive in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last thing you saw was him turn to dust, and you guys left the Shadowfell, and then from the Shadowfell and this battle, you've just now returned, not as wounded as you were before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened? What's going on? Where are we? Who am I? What happened? What's going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to pee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, bringing it back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you lose your memory last time? Did we ever realize that you lost your memory the last time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you real?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is abundantly real.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I Greater Restoration them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that how we did it before?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know how you did it before because I don't think I was here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is weird for you, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Totally. He was dead a second ago. Now he's alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there still dust in your pocket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything that can end a curse works for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I draw my whip. I whip him in the face. I'm whipping Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing? Scanlan, stop it! Stop it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not real. He's an illusion. He's an illusion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, my eye! Why does my eye hurt so much? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's with your eye?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know! It shouldn't have hurt that much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were just fighting a god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We were in the Feywild for a little while, and then took a nap there, and then we came here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the long run, I think this is going to be better for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, as this is happening, Pike walks up and touches her hand on you, and there's a flash of warm energy through your body, and suddenly the memories rush back to you from the Feywild.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why your eye hurts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His testicles hung so low!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mine, or Vecna's?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vecna was wearing a big dress, so we probably could have seen his balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magical muumuu? Flying above the whole time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go over and touch Grog, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's two Greater Restorations. The memory returns to you of the Feywild.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This makes me wonder if you've been doing it wrong this whole time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's whenever he remembers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax. You feel this small, pounding headache in your head. It's a very faint burn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually have this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You shake your head, and it changes in your head, based on where you're facing.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Duskmeadow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's... make a survival check to try and figure out where you are around the city of Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Based on looking at the placement of the sun in the sky, looking at the mountain range that this is built on the northern side of the city, you get the sense that you guys are close to the perfectly south side of Vasselheim, the entrance that leads toward the Quad Roads in the center. That burning sensation, it seems to be localized. No matter where you turn your head, it's pointing that direction, to the northwest of your current location, and the more you concentrate on it, the more you feel that hatred and loathing curl and push in that direction. You know what lies in that direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have a sense of distance, or just direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knows where Vecna is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check here, real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vec-dar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vecna-dar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your Vecna, Victor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know the distance, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know the distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 350 to 400 miles northwest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She gave you a Vecna compass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's badass. 350 miles. How far is that from us right now? Where is that in distance?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sonoma.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really? It's that close? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It ain't close. It's eight hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight-hour drive? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are we taking the hybrid?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stop off, go to wine country.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll be fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The burn that I feel. There's no question what it is for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is part of your charge. This was part of the deal that you struck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What deal? You wanna tell us what deal it was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't hear any of that shit. It's in my head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are the Raven Queen's homing missile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking A.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm going to need those boots back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I'm a missile.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you think about it. You think about what you've done. I know you'll do the right thing, eventually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a random thought. While y'all are trying to go get Sarenrae, this is where the story of the Lord of the Quad Roads is. If you're not familiar with the Lord of the Quad Roads, he was a gentleman that just very quickly came into fame and fortune, and he's a personal friend of mine, and I thought I might try and go find him for a favor. You know, one of those people if you pop in town, they get real pissed if you don't stop by.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he a god?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe? Could be. Not sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have a lot of time, so do you think you could split off with somebody?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'll meet you up where we were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To the temple of Sarenrae.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To your temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You may not want me in company for Sarenrae.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty sure we want your brain around, Percy. I know you're uncomfortable around all this shit, but I want you to fucking suck it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just don't want to say the wrong thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't have you away from me right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a deeply-inappropriate convincing mena-men-mechanism. It is working. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's beautiful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a terrible person!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, she's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need to stop by the temple of the Raven Queen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just had a really long conversation with her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think we do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To Sarenrae?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, are you splitting off?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It's real important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can stay on task, though, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I could just pop in, give him a little fist bump, and I'll meet you at Sarenrae's hovel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want a teammate to go with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think you need a minder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to pick someone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fancy a trip?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With you, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just the two of us, wandering through a city together?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. You know, totally behaving ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you see this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I see what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's relaxed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't go to heaven without us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sarenrae's a big fan of the cube.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where was the Melora grove thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're talking about the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That we buried Senokir's wife's ashes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're referring to the Abundant Terrace, within the Birth Heart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Birth Heart would be on the northeastern side of the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it's here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I go talk to Melora? Should I go try and recruit Melora? Team Sarenrae and Team Melora?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do one at a time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just trying to save time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're a bit beyond that, at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Besides, we'd know if Old Shit Nuts is moving closer because of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That doesn't mean I understand what it means, so I think we should start with one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're eventually going to have to tell somebody in charge what's happening. But to Sarenrae! Let's get this ball rolling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is the official title of the location, which is taken from the realm of Sarenrae, known as the Island of Renewal. As she sees your face, Acolyte Sheila goes, "Pike! Mistress Pike!" And runs up and takes you in her arms. She tries to lift you, but you're far too heavy with the armor. (grunts)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay. I'm heavier than I look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, of course."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Pure muscle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, my apologies. I am Sheila, and I know who you are. We've heard much. You are welcome. You "are welcome here at the Temple of Renewal. Please come in."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks lovely in here. You guys have really kept it up quite nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The hard part was already done. Come into her light, please." And leads you all into this tower. The excavation site here. What was once a large pit, below which the original temple was, the edges have been ground down to be this slow decline, and a tower was risen up. The actual stonework was ascended about 15 feet up, so it's not quite street level; it's a little below, but it's this small bowl that leads to the tower itself, and then it rises up a good 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is great, Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not all by myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this how you learned all of your stoneworking stuff?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's good, like a druid could do it. It's very impressive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good craftsmanship.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sheila. (sighs) We're trying to figure out the best way to... what am I trying to say, here? We're trying to go to Sarenrae, but actually go to her. Not in the sense of the mind, actually walking up and saying hello.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't realize how crazy it sounds until you say it out loud.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When I started, I realized this is so weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a bit beyond my realm. Perhaps we should speak to Acolyte Vincent Clore. He's the "keeper of knowledge and scripture. He'd probably be more help than I."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you try just talking to Sarenrae?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sometimes she doesn't talk to me. I can always try, since we're in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go ahead and try. You know what? Let me say a prayer real quick, Sheila.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Want to take a knee, everybody?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy, it's fine. You don't need to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. In for a penny.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's all take a knee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you say as your prayer?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm back here, and this is so beautiful. I'm sure you've seen and have... seen what's happened where we were, and I know the last time we talked, you warned me and told me that you wouldn't be there, but I think we're past the point of being able to do this on our own, just our mortal selves, and we need bigger help. Might I ask for (sighs) your-- please help us. I don't know what else to say. This is beyond us now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the words leave your mouth, yourself prostrate before the temple you helped build with your own hands, you open your eyes, but you see not the temple before you. You see, instead, around you essences of a vision that have been blurred at the edges, but now come clear. You see around you sandy shores, pearlescent almost. White sand that glitters in your presence, just at the peripheral, glass gems, diamonds, you can't tell, but the light that hits it seems to just sparkle and give off this light. You hear water around you rushing up and pulling back from the shore. You see statues, so many statues before you, and one that appears to be a glass fortress, a spire that rises up crystalline, translucent, but seeming to glow with the flicker of an internal flame's heartbeat. As you look up at the top of the temple, you see the wings unfurl, drift towards you, and you see coming towards you the physical form of the Everlight herself. Her darkened skin, her beautiful smile, her light hair leaving a trail of flame and gold and sunlight behind. She comes forth and drifts right before you and says, "Then the time is right for us to meet. Come. Come "and join me on the Island of Renewal, within the blessed fields of Elysium. Here, we can speak."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I immediately take a knee. Thank you for letting me come here. Just to see you, and-- we will come to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "Then come. You have the tools. You have "the means. I await." And as she lets go, you look down in your hand and you see what appears to be a small little piece of curved metal made of a bright, polished platinum, like a U. As you look up to her again, you're just staring at the statue. You're staring around the temple. You look down at your hand, but the item remains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She just gave us a key!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you guys see anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We saw you praying and you had this crazy look in your eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You looked blissful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So happy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow! Well, I went there. I went to the Island of Renewal; that's where she is. And she gave this to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I recognize what it is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all hear Scanlan Shorthalt's voice in our minds.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Over the earring. Shut up, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Structurally similar, I suppose.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, it's not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can give, and I can take away. (laughs) It's different in the designs that have been crafted, that have been a little more crude. This has, once you reach out and touch it, it has that vibration to it, that hint of attuned activity to the metal, the pure metal, that definitely gives you some semblance of direction in your subtle understanding of the inner and outer planes and the general cosmology that surrounds Exandria.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She gave us a key to find her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the tuning fork that I needed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the-- wow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's let people know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was cool. Vax, you have a very different relationship with your god, but-- awesome! That was cool!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was she like?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She was so beautiful! And just glowed. No! And I just can't even describe it, she just glowed and it felt like-- do you remember the movie Contact? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean the old scroll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, the old scroll Contact, where she gets to the beach and her dad is there? That's what it felt like!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I need to go back there! Let's all go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Do other gods live there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're waiting on a guy, too, aren't we? The lady, Sheila, ran off--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. She mentioned the blessed fields of Elysium. Sarenrae, as you know, the general understanding of her existence in the pantheon had been faded for a while. There was a betrayal to her in the Calamity and most of her following was annihilated. As gods, as they currently exist, their worship is what sustains their importance and viability in the various planes. She diminished, so her location, her home, has been kept from most existing scripture and worship both for her protection and those of her followers. So the existence of the Island of Renewal and where it may be have only recently come to your attention. The blessed fields of Elysium, though, they are a fairly well-known location in religious circles, and is also home to the Fortress of the Sun, the home of Pelor, the Dawnfather.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's convenient.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Different area on the plane. The Fortress of the Sun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Fortress of the Sun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The blessed fields of Elysium are an idyllic plane of good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are these things Pike knows because of her expertise, or does everyone in the world know a certain amount about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They know the gods, and they know the realms, but the name of the plane? This is known to her because of her study of religion. This is more of an academic understanding of the real essence of the gods, where they come from.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't think it was going to work! Sheila, I think--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sheila begins to return two minutes later with acolyte Vincent Clor, who's this mousy-looking guy. His eyes are smaller than they should be it seems for the size of his round face, he comes up with a big toothy grin. "I was told that you were seeking my presence, "wonderful Mistress Pike."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's wonderful to see you, Vincent. I'm so sorry she went to go get you. I think we might be okay, and we got some answers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably tell them what's going on. People should start to prepare themselves for what's coming. We can't just keep this to ourselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This could affect everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to affect everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Tell no one

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not here! You went shopping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're in the House of Lady Favors of Renewal right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll get to you guys in a moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You, obviously, have heard of Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I don't."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So there's this guy. He's a shithead. Okay, there's this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wanted to be a god, but he wasn't a god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three mimosas later, and three hours later...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We explain the story of Vecna and tell him he's back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (slurring) And he totally didn't call us back! And I told him I'm not getting back together again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sounds like a really, really bad man."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long were we in the Feywild? Do we even know that for sure?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I figure that out with my check, or no?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the date?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, how much time has it been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The date would be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a calendar system?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, there is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we don't know it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he's going to tell us a date that will mean nothing to us because we don't actually know the date we left because we don't know how dates work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it's Bidetsday. Yeah, Bidetsday.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bidusday, Bidetsday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's see. Bidetsday.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bidusday, Biwhatsday. Biheyhay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, I'm having to look it up because you did this to me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is like watching the DND icon crash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's frozen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is the 12th day of Misothar of 812 PD?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, of course it is! Does that sound normal to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds like the exact same day that you left, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's convenient.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the same day we left? Oh, cool! We lucked out! Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did luck out! I was like, oh man! There's a chance they could show up and have missed the whole thing. I would have had to change a lot, but that would have been fun. That would have been fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For one roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From one roll, yeah. Hey, Feywild's a dangerous thing when timetables--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, buddy, you missed your window!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So basically, we're going to need a lot of help, and please stay in prayer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get ready to fight, Vincent. Get ready to fucking fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look at Sheila and Vincent, who look like anyone's in-laws, and go, "Very well, Mistress, right?" "Yes, we'll do our best."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: PS, do you know anything about the fields of Elysium?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you just say PS to someone? Did you say that out loud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, they are a home to souls who champion the cause of good outside the forces of law and "chaos. It's a beautiful place, from what the tales say. Many who go never leave. It's so beautiful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What gods live there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all I know. My research is limited."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. Should you tell him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't feel like I want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's gather the boys and alert whatever government we can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, thank you for your help today.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was wonderful to see you guys again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, my pleasure, Mistress Pike. Good luck. Hopefully, you'll stop this thing."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hopefully we will. Please pray for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike can get you in touch with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Melora is really good at it, too. We should talk to Melora.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine. We know people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you. Keep up the good work. You're doing, just, all the great stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like the idea that anywhere we go, we embarrass the one person that knows anybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you off to? What's your next direction?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will note that Vax feels a slight sense of bittersweet pride at the amount of bliss that Pike just went through. Just a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You two. Where you going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, so I know this guy named the Lord of the Quad Roads. Back up. While you were gone-- were you gone? I'm not sure. Did you know that I have this little magical thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So because you kept my secret about Craven Edge, and you never told anybody about that, right? Not one time. Never told anyone. I'm going to confide in you about this thing. I found this little deck of cards, and I was like, oh, I'm going to pull a card out! And I did, and I got a magic weapon! I could throw it and it would start fighting and stuff. But that turned to rust. And so I was like, I wanted to pull more out. But Vex was like, no, it's so dangerous!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good impression. She can be that way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I went to Vasselheim. Actually, I was looking for you, you little shitstack. And I was like, hey, I've got an idea! (explosion) Boom! In my head!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the best retelling of this ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, I'm going to find a guy to pull out cards for me, see what happens!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because you were afraid or because she said you can't?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I heard her nagging me in my head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Conscience.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. So I got this drunk guy on the street and I was like, hey, pull out a card. And guess what? He pulled a card, and he got wishes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you get wishes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Because fucking I made him pick it. So he goes, ooh! And all of a sudden, he was in fancy clothes and he had a servant that appeared in the alley!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he thank you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was like, thanks! I guess I have two more of these! And he fucking ran off!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait! He took your cards and he left?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he pulled the one card and it disappeared in his hand. Right? And then he walked off. But the point is: he's got two more wishes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! And I told him, Grog! Grog gave you those! Remember me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just so I'm clear. We're going to go, grab him, steal his wishes, leave him in a ditch somewhere. Is that the plan? What's our game here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not opposed to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's our game? What are we trying to get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought, maybe, if we walked in and I had a title like Grog the Wish Giver, and we were calling to check in on him, that maybe it's time to pay his tithe to the Wish Giver, and maybe he would give us one of the two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so our game is to intimidate him into having him give you one of the wishes back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Or pressure him. Lay it on thick. We could say like, "Your fucking face is going to "fall off if you don't give me one of your remaining wishes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened to the deck of cards?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I've still got them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are we going back to get-- oh! He has more

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he should give one to us. What would you wish for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well. (haltingly) For peace on Exandria, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't seem enthusiastic about that wish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to live forever! Just never die! I just want to him to go, you will never die. I'm happy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a better wish for you, for sure. And we have two of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you really old, though? You get company.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true. It'd be nice having you around for a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would you wish for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peace on--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, enough of the bullshit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, probably. Do you just get one wish? Because I could be a littler taller, a little buffer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think maybe you can get real descriptive with it, too, so you can make it real complicated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would I wish for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe think about it while we're on our way. Yeah! How about we go and we pressure him and then if he doesn't bite, then we kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take this hat, it's the Hat of Disguise. Put it on, and you can look however you want to look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to look like me. He's going to remember me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, then never mind that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're the idea man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry! You're throwing a lot at me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Warm it up, son. Let's get the bad ones out of the way right now. Shake it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. What do we need to intimidate him? Do you need me to be your enforcer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Or maybe my manservant. Can you make me look really amazing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You already look amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But rich and Wish Giver-y.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And now you can look however you think you should look! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody at the table is broken! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to look like a sultan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't do anything. You have to attune to it. At this point in time, by the way, you watch as four armed guards start approaching.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a great record with these guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they approaching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're approaching you, and two on the sides are spreading out, and two are walking up with purpose towards you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The popo. We haven't done anything wrong, we're just talking on the street! We're just two guys! Yeah! We haven't done any magic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the two come to the flank and stop, hands on the sides of their spears, the two that walked up the middle, there's one that looks to be a captain of some kind and this one to his right who's dressed in standard guard gear looks like he's got a few long-healed scars and he goes, "That looks just like him."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. What did you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were with him as Tary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I wasn't there! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one in adorned armor. "Sir, might I have your name and purpose here in Vasselheim?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Peter Frostbucket! I seek Lord of the Quad Roads!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggling) Make a deception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need it! Negative one! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. We're going to have to kill some guards, aren't we? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two and a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They did that, not us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sarenrae comes down and says, never mind!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your picture is going to be up in a small office by the gates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain-looking individual goes, "Right, Mr. Frostbucket. We would like the both of you to "please come with us." The two guards rush into your flank a bit and place their hands on your shoulder and your shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I just met this man. I've never seen him before in my life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've been walking with him for 20 minutes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for coming over here. He was holding me hostage. He wouldn't let me leave. I'm a small man. I'm defenseless, and he was holding me captive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deception. Okay, 24.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, what is that eyebrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a natural 20! He goes, "Really. And what's your name?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh-huh. Well, Gerald Butler, the two of you should come with us." He turns around and starts walking away. The other guard with him, the one who spotted you earlier, walks with him, but keeps looking over his shoulder at you. He looks genuinely terrified of you. At this point, you realize, oh yeah, you've seen this guy before. The two other guards shove you forward, and as they push you a couple of steps in that direction, they lower their spears towards your back, "Keep moving!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, sorry. Aside from the four around us, is anyone around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's probably roughly 20 to 25 different townsfolk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We just were walking down the street! What happened?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is profiling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is racial profiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carve a figure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You or me? All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, mine's do one thing. You've got options.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will, I guess-- Jesus. It all seems so stupid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to go talk to the Lord of the Crossroads!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Critical Role: It all seems so stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! That's our catchphrase now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will use some gigantic spell for no reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fighting gods one day, getting arrested in the street the other day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can help me fine, it's you I need to deal with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Manipulate that guy that recognized us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but I don't know what he knows! I don't know anything! All I know is he came over and fingered you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He said, it looks like it's him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I will-- Jesus. Okay. Fuck! I don't know what to do without causing everyone around us to die or be scared! All right! Is there a leader?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's the captain. The one that looks scared looks over and says, "Is your other friend around? The other big one?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kind of blanched complexion, orange hair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah with the--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits people in the face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That one."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somewhere around here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns to the guard captain and goes, "There's another one around here. Possibly two."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, the thing about that one, though, he doesn't like to leave loose ends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goddamn it! 13!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop rolling that one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I stay with my dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did this other one look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This other one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, the other one, what did he look like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very tall and metallic-looking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Metallic-looking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean, the one we just saw around the corner?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We did! I was not really aware at the time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The super scary one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Well, now that you mention it, I felt a chill!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please believe us. There is an even bigger danger coming, and I think-- oh yes, it's right there. And I will Major Image what I think he's describing, which is a tall Iron Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (laughs) First, make a deception check to see if they look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, his final change is complete!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he didn't look like this before?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's much worse!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's much worse? Yes, it's much worse!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, suddenly you watch as its size expands even further. It has metal tusks that now protrude from the front of its face, and it's breathing steam and smoke, its eyes red and glowing. (huffing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I trip and fall. Please, save yourselves! Run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (horn blows)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to kill him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't kill him. We'll all die!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach up and snap the horn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (horn blows, cracking)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Horns make him angrier! And I'll make the image go crazy with rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Angrily starts stomping around, not affecting anything directly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) It's a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet it's a 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, this is everything I ever wanted!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances back at you, reaches back, and starts pulling a set of manacles from the side of his belt and glances over at this image, and you see the face of recognition, of somebody who now knows exactly what you were up to. This guy is not your petty wandering guard in the center of the street, and while two other guards have rushed up to try to push townsfolk out of the way, and they have their spears drawn at this thrashing entity, the captain goes, "Stop, it's not real." You now see a bunch of other guards that are now, after hearing the horn call, rushing around the sides of the street.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you got us. Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we turn ourselves in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Sure, yeah. Lock me up first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whack) (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're starting a war with all of the guards in Vasselheim?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think that far ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They started this war. We're finishing it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll 1d4 damage with the Titanstone Gauntlets and add your strength modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's hire new guards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The helmet he was wearing, which is carved around the face and eyes and nose, as you slam it with your fist, it caves in a bit, and he immediately hits the ground and is dazed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guards, who were looking at him when he shouted that, saw you deck him in the side of the head, and they immediately start rushing to his aid as the other guards are coming in on the side of the street. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any buildings around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are still walking through the Quad Roads, and the Quad Roads is the most populated portion of the city. The worship here of Erathis is generally about civilization. There's a lot of people and a lot of buildings around. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) You're bigger. All right, I will do the old classic. I'm going to Polymorph Grog into a giant eagle. The old standby. The giant eagle trick, if you'll accept it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll get smarter. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, once again, you feel the wings extend. You're free to fly, and huh! That's how numbers work. You leap onto his back as the guards are coming up, and you (wing beats) take up. As you guys begin to fly up, the illusion vanishes immediately, and all of the guards that are rushing up stop, see this happening, and start switching over to their various crossbows and ranged implements.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Yeah. I've got nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Literally, that escalated quickly. All right, so a bunch of shots trying to be taken at both of you. I'm going to say six to each from the crossbows. What's the giant eagle's AC, Marisha?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh gosh, you are keeper of the giant eagle AC.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the giant eagle small enough to Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I rolled a perception check for that one guard, and he rolled really high and saw you walking down the street and was like, "Oh fuck." And went and got the captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should have killed him back at the shop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that the takeaway from this? You should have killed the guard? I'm just checking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure this problem wouldn't have existed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so two shots hit the eagle for seven and six. 13 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are at 27.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wait, is that the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Nope, I lied. How many points?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're at half. You're at 13 hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have 13 left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to break your concentration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the most hilarious thing I've ever seen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next week, a prison break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mixing it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of piercing damage. I need you to go ahead and make four concentration checks, with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I add? Nothing, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Saving throw. Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More for that one. 17. More.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you can't talk. Shit. Land us in an alley somewhere, and we'll change our appearance, I suppose.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (squawks)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. What's the eagle's intelligence modifier? This would be perception, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this wisdom? Well, they have keen sight, so they have advantage on wisdom checks, and the wisdom is plus two. Although, don't you maintain--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do in wild shape. Polymorph, you do not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So plus two, and you have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the bonus to perception?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They just have advantage on perception checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Easy enough, you glance around with your eagle eyes, and you see what appears to be a darkened alleyway that is in a cluster of heavily residential buildings. You dive down. You hold on, (screams) going down into this free fall, the wind rushing past you. You have to grab your hat to make sure it doesn't fly off your head, and then you dive down into the alleyway. Come and land, and you watch as two children that were playing with sticks glance over and go, "Oh!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run along, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screams) And they run out of the alleyway, screaming around the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I release Polymorph.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You didn't tell me that the guards all hated you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only one, apparently. That is what happens when you leave things alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. We've learned a lesson today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, should we still look for the Lord of the Quad Roads?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like that ship has sailed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe not. (sighs) Maybe we should go find the others.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Temple of Sarenrae? Where is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I wear the hat, since I am apparently a wanted person now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't I just make us both invisible?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. 3rd-level Invisibility, right? I can do me and another person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe so, yeah. All right, so you both turn invisible and you make your way towards the temple of Sarenrae.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are leaving the temple, this wonderful appearance, you see commotion in the distance, and you see guards rushing from street to street.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's happening here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think that guy went and alerted everyone about Vecna?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was probably Vecna.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably Vecna. Vecna's a much bigger problem, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would be the odds of that one guard seeing him? This is a very big city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) It was the guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear this voice out of nowhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's us. We're here. We're next to you, but we're invisible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you get allegiance from the Lord of the Crossroads? Right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not exactly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm reaching down for a head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't find a head, but you find Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Vex. You know, he was "indiposed." We should go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you sure? We could spend some time here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you want to talk to Kord?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have a drink, see the local color?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't really look like me in this city right now. I punched a captain of the guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You punched--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were gone for what, 45 minutes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it that long?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was like 30.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It happened so fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was an incident, in which we scared many innocent people and assaulted several guards, and they shot us with crossbows, and we are bleeding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just said goodbye to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's fucking get out of here. Are we just going to try to bamf to the fucking fields, or are we going to talk to Melora, or are we going to bamf to the fields and then go talk to Melora?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Melora doesn't exist on that plane.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but we'll have to come back here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the priests of the temple are going to alert-- give them the basic story of Vecna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, dear. The communication system that you and Percival and Tary set up. Is it here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the closest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Fire Ashari. Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we've got two things on our plate, right? We need to start--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alerting the cities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can send a message. Do you have that ability?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the Fire Ashari, and then to the fields of Elysium?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the Fire Ashari, then to the fields of Elysium.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's mist there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it fast to mist to the Fire Ashari?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just I Dream of Jeannie us there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're going to the Ashari? What happened with Sarenrae?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's next.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to do that, we're just getting the word out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Misting to the Fire Ashari is not that long, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In mist form, it won't take you but a few hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I thought. A couple of hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More than that. Like four hours or so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just getting a message to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to alert all of the major cities of the continents that things have gone pear-shaped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should Tree Stride there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While you were selling stuff on the black market, Keyleth and Freddie here have been building this system. They built it. In all the major cities, they can get out an alarm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take that back. We Tree Stride.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Transport Via Plants. I always say that wrong. Tree Stride's a 5th-level spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tree Stride rolls off the tongue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tree Stride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tree Stride.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It makes me feel old.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a lot of stuff going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you guys step through the rapidly created doorway from one of the nearby trees here in the Quad Roads, as you're heading southward into that space, you pull through the portal and end up falling outside of the Cindergrove, in the cauldron that contains the city of Pyrah, of the Fire Ashari. Within a short time, you find yourself to the actual city of Pyrah and make your way towards the home of Cerkonos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately look for Cerkonos, tell him what happened, light the fire orbs. The chaos orbs. Crisis orbs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crisis orbs. No worries. Speaking with him and letting him know the circumstance, he nods. "I "do not know the extent in which this danger will present itself, but we will light these orbs with "what information we can. We rely upon you, soon, to fill in the gaps of information."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The city--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thar Amphala.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thar Amphala.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Thar Amphala.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We think Wildemount.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was snowing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We barely escaped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They might have the best knowledge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In Wildemount, you say? It is a far way away."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that's why we're alerting you first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will put up the orbs and try and gather what information we have."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let people know. Do you remember how bad the Conclave was? That's what we're talking about here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Possibly worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After this, I'm retiring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm getting too old for this shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are going to be going to the blessed fields of Elysium from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know where that is, but good luck."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dungeon Master, where's Vasselheim on this map?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vasselheim is in Issylra, which is the upper left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the way up here? And didn't his internal compass say 350 miles northwest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we kind of know where he is, right? Northwest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vasselheim is-- I'll have to show you where it is. Vasselheim resides on this side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so it's up at the peak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe up here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, he might not be in Wildemount. I don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's in the north.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 350 miles northwest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a real map here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will light this beacon. Stay safe, and good luck."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you speak to the other Ashari and my father, let him know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Immediately."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Cerkonos. Kaitiaki.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kaitiaki."

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Kaitiaki.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plane Shift?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still invisible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need anything else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, this is not going to be dangerous, right? We're just going to talk to some friendly people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good plane of existence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You Plane Shift? All right, as you all put your hands in each other's, you feel the familiar sense of your physical form being drawn through the barrier of the Prime Material Plane, and much like when you transitioned to the Nine Hells, you feel yourselves pulled into this temporary space, this darkness, this sea of endless void with a distant blinking of stars that shimmer. You understand this as being the Astral Sea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) This is the Astral Sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There before you, you see the glimmering, almost burning lattice of the Divine Gate come streaking towards you at immense speed, and you know you've passed through comfortably once before, so you hope and brace for impact and pass through again, that warmth almost coming to a similar state of burning, but then leaving you behind. And just as fast, as it passes by you, you land, your feet hitting ground, ground that gives.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three-point landing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An entire beach of pearls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It really is heaven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impressed noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How pretty! Last episode was so ugly, and this episode's so pretty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You used to be a 4th or 5th-level cleric, and now we're here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You talked to Sarenrae!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. That is crazy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Started in Stillben, now we're here!

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far we've come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look how far I've come!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's just give Vecna the Prime Material Plane. Let's stay here! New plan. New plan: stay here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: New plan: mimosas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan and Grog. Sam and Travis, left alone to their devices.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We couldn't even walk across town!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was just trying to go see a man about a wish. The trouble just comes to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you were having this conversation, I'm like, oh, it would be so funny if-- yeah, they're not being careful. They're walking through the street.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot that Doty knocked out the guards, so I should have been like, oh, we rescued you from this horror.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty knocked out the guards originally, it was just that they followed you as you were following them, and you're an accomplice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't actually do anything because they were unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for the shopkeeper that saw you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Again, got to kill them all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure. Now we know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we've all learned a valuable lesson.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we haven't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one's learned anything of value.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to get you those wishes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He might have already used them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably used them. Probably really wanted some ice cream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done. So much fun. Thank you so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not a single dice in the dice jail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and only one of us is an undead ghost now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not undead!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's such a lich.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell it to the necromancer, pal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a heartbeat, a slow heartbeat, and meat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, guys. Thank you so much for watching. We'll see you soon. Have a wonderful weekend and a wonderful 4th of July.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to be at AX!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'll be at AX for the Persona panel on Saturday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, Meg and Wendy are going to have a booth there, so you can go to Artists' Alley. I think they said 11am? Go onto their Twitter. But anyway, they're going to be there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: David Mack posters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One more day! Not even a full day!

lines.name: LIAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) One day more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've lost my druid die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, good job, tonight. It was great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Happy birthday, Matthew.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy birthday!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, Max! Is this still a thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He quit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the break, he said "I quit" and he walked out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Max still here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently the Critters got you ice cream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone got you ice cream.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of ice cream?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ben and Jerry's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want ice cream.

lines.name: RYAN
lines.text: He's gone!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ice cream's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Our producer is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just ran with my ice cream. You know, I respect that. Well, thank you. Thank you to whoever sent ice cream. And thank you for all the amazing messages. Today has been an absolute flood of positivity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
